summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4064 for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest, from Fauntleroy Avenue to West Holly Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 39763 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
